title: Chinas INSANE NEW Bamboo Farming Techniques

tasks.task: Physical tasks related to bamboo cultivation in China
subtasks: Threshing bamboo seeds in spring (March to July)
Storing and handling bamboo seeds (moisture control, preventing drying, sun exposure, cold)
Spreading bamboo seeds on farmland and watering
Transplanting seedlings into plastic containers (indoors or greenhouses) until they are strong
Cutting and cleaning mature bamboo plants
Propagating bamboo plants by burying cut pieces with holes filled with water
Propagating running bamboo through rhizomes (underground root expansion)
Propagating via tree branching (encouraging root growth in soil through cuttings)
Digging and transplanting small pieces of existing bamboo plants
Using tissue culture method for bamboo propagation
